name: Mandrinette
description:
There were a lot planted near the port of Barcelona.
Pretty sure it's a critically endangered species :/

name: Indian chrysanthemum
description:
Very pretty, it has pink petals that turn green on the tips.
My girlfriend gave them to me and they survived a long time ^^

name: purple gromwell
description: Found in the forest while on a walk, this intense blue really stands out amongst all the green

name: Neapolitan Crocus
description: Found in the japanese flower garden in Dusseldorf, Germany

name: saucer magnolia
description: Found in the japanese flower garden in Dusseldorf, Germany. Almost reminded me of a Sakura tree

name: scarlet bottlebrush
description: Really weird and mystical looking, I found it hanging from a house while on a run

name: oleander / rosebay
description: I don't remember the story behind this one nor where I found it tbh

name: field briar
description: Found in the forest while on a walk.
